review: Not so great. It begins to overheat after about an hour and begins to freeze for random periods. Pretty unacceptable overall. I returned mine. Try again Amazon.
author: N. Green

review: It is a bit slow and also interfere with my HDTV over the air signal.
author: D. Tran "green man"

review: I love it! It was perfectly packaged. And so easy to install! So far so good! Great price great product! Yup I'm a happy girl
author: Yvonne bonilla

review: Very easy to install. Great product.

review: Buffers much more than roku stick.
author: Matthew Royalty

review: Great for those without cable.  The programming is good!  Very smart!
